import React, {Component} from 'react' import { Field, reduxForm } from 'redux-form' import axios from "axios" import "./Form.css" import { connect } from "react-redux" import { changeToTrue } from "./index.js" function Form(props){ function submit(event){ const registered = { firstname: event.firstname, lastname: event.lastname, email: event.email, password: event.password } axios.post("http://localhost:5000/app/signup", registered) .then(response => console.log(response.data)) } return (

Create account

Already have an account? Sign-In

) } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { // dispatching plain actions changeToTrue: () => dispatch({ type: "LOGGEDIN" }), } } Form = reduxForm({ // a unique name for the form form: 'contact' })(Form) export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps())(Form)
